Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: MR Shopper
Reviews.Content: This product fitted my phone properly and the phone looks brand new. i was also happy for the tools that i received, they came in rather handy. everything works fine with this housing.

Reviews.Title: Be careful
Reviews.Author: FyaPrince
Reviews.Content: There was a few problems installing this product first the SIM card does not fit properly, the hone does not power up when I used the middle piece, the track pad does not select when the keypad is installed and the installation was done by a professional. All the parts like the loud speaker  micro sd slot side buttons camera flash and the bezel at the top come already installed to the case. The housing looks like the original and looks shinny new.so i gave two starts.

Reviews.Title: OEM!!!
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Came as descibed, original parts. . It was worth the price. Amazing how changing the housing makes my phone look brand new.

Reviews.Title: Fits just right
Reviews.Author: Firoz
Reviews.Content: This housing is the original blackberry one, and therefore, fits perfectly. Instruction manual would have been helpful. If you look for changing your 9700 housing, this is the one.

Reviews.Title: Bold 9700 Housing
Reviews.Author: MB "Mega Boast"
Reviews.Content: everything came perfect.. since im the first review i gave them a 5 because they deserved it.. going buy a next one

Reviews.Title: NOT OEM
Reviews.Author: A. Nguyen
Reviews.Content: This is NOT OEM.  The item arrived with the top cover (where it covers the mute/lock button) fell apart.  The grill that covers the speakers also fell apart and it looks cheap.  Very disappointed.The 2 stars is for amazon excellent customer service and quick shipping.

Reviews.Title: Not fully satisfied
Reviews.Author: Puzzlevip
Reviews.Content: i was a little bit disappointed when i receive my package the housing got a small chip in it which was looking bad when not in case. My wife wanted to return it, but I kind of saying no it'll do. The package was intact which means it shipped just like that cause there is no way that could happen during shipment.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Kerwin
Reviews.Content: I purchases this housing for my blackberry 9700 after waiting so many days to actually get it, when I finally got the housing it was defective, it came with a broken screw in the screw hole where i have to mount my circuit board and the volume controler doesnt work.. I'm really disappointed.....

Reviews.Title: bnlackberry bold 9700 full housing
Reviews.Author: Rice
Reviews.Content: this product was durable and made of a betteand stronger material than the last housing i purchased this phone hit the ground so many times and everything is still in tact and working properly must recommend this to anyone changing their housng on their blackberry bold 9700

Reviews.Title: used
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: The article did not like it seems to be used as the back has scratches and bumps.fits well in the phone

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: LS_W
Reviews.Content: Had dropped the BB too many times, it needed help and got it.  A perfect it and glad I changed it.  No printed stickers, so service provider with question you if you bring it in a store...

Reviews.Title: Good fit except for panel below keyboard
Reviews.Author: Eaton Hubbard
Reviews.Content: Got two of these.  Good quality and relatively good fit.  Only had issues with the little panel below the keyboard on one device.  It fit in place, but seems to pop out just a tad too easily.  This only happens if it is bumped, and not usually during regular use.  Gave two really battered phones each a new lease on life.  Good value thus far.

Reviews.Title: Is not a good fit for this phone
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I found that this is the Housing for an AT&T; Blackberry Bold. I'm not sure if it is the 9700. it leaves an open space on the right side of the phone where you can see light inside. I also stripped my original screws trying to get them in place. I did tell the seller to sell the product with screws. In return got a complaint about how those screws cost money. I warn you to take your chances with another vendor.

Reviews.Title: Good housing
Reviews.Author: KDOT
Reviews.Content: I ordered this when my 9700 housing looked atrocious and I was gearing up to resell it. For the most part things fit perfectly, with the exception being the large metal section where the battery should go. I ended up having to swap pieces from this such as the chrome bezel, headphone jack etc and place them in my 9700 since I couldn't use everything in this package. In the end, I had a brand new-looking 9700 ready for resale.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Fabulous
Reviews.Content: very good buy exactly what i ask for and what i saw in the pic would be purchasing from you in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for a non oem part
Reviews.Author: MOHD
Reviews.Content: The housing fits well and the material is alright you can tell the difference from the oem part but if your just fixing the appearance it would be perfect

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: jorge
Reviews.Content: it works, nothing more to say.... my wife get happy with it..... thanks lord for all the good thimks in the world

Reviews.Title: Changes
Reviews.Author: Bev G
Reviews.Content: Came as described, original parts; worth the price. Amazing how changing the housing of an old phone makes it look brand new.

Reviews.Title: Happy With My Pruchase
Reviews.Author: Silvia Morales
Reviews.Content: I gave this item Five stars because it was exactly what I was expecting. I switched my old, damaged housing for this new one and my phone now looks great.

Reviews.Title: ggreat  product
Reviews.Author: Ryan Griffith
Reviews.Content: i loved this worked wonderful could believe i spent my money good at least once. thanks for such great service

Reviews.Title: Like a new phone.
Reviews.Author: Richard Martin, JR.
Reviews.Content: Very nice and received real fast. Was in very good condition too and was very easy to make transfer into new casing.

Reviews.Title: perfect!!
Reviews.Author: Ignacio Inuyama
Reviews.Content: Now my phone looks new...  fits perfect! Lo recomiendo, ahora mi telefono luce nuevo... trae la bocina, y el conector para audifonos que el mio los tenia danados!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Masiel Peguero Pena "Masiel Peguero"
Reviews.Content: It was what I expect, the balckberry now looks like new. It is original so you can buy it with no problem.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: Glendy M. C "Endy The Kidd"
Reviews.Content: Very good article, I liked a lot. are top quality and very comfortable, I would like to get more articles like this and keep in touch with my trusted sellers and not been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: not so happy
Reviews.Author: Katherine Tucker
Reviews.Content: I recieved it my volume buttons so that is a delay with me transferring my new housing over to my old

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: alex Dahik
Reviews.Content: this is an oem product it fits perfectly, just change everything in to this new case and you phone will look like new

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: kelroy
Reviews.Content: Fits perfectly great item good purchase fits perfectly works like new replaces the old one no one cam tell the difference

Reviews.Title: Very practical
Reviews.Author: Pedro Acosta
Reviews.Content: This item is very practical and fit perfectly to the original Blackblerry, I felt very comfortable at first sigth when I take the housing, works very good and the conditions were great.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: T. Peterson
Reviews.Content: It's made my phone look brand new. Only problem is that the last row of buttons are really hard to press. Other than that I pove that my phone looks new!

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Bold 9700 OEM Full Housing with Battery Door
Reviews.Author: Carl
Reviews.Content: This product really rocks.I was able to do the installation myself and It is definitely OEM. It fits my Bold 9700 just like the original did. I am now able to get better cell signal than before, even in places where I couldn't get a signal before. Also,Even though I really didn't need a new track pad my new housing came with one. Now my phone looks like a brand new phone. Really love it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: AN
Reviews.Content: Have yet to install it. It definitely good very good and not cheap like some chinese made housings. Brings all of the exterior parts such as the camera cover ect, which I needed.

Reviews.Title: Hey....do I have a brand new Berry?
Reviews.Author: Get It Dunn!
Reviews.Content: This vendor sent me a quality product and for a reasonable price I received all of the external parts for my BlackBerry 9700. Once I changed everything my BB felt like it was brand new. Since the replacement parts were OEM they fit my device perfectly.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: lalala
Reviews.Content: really really satisfied with this product.my phone used to have messed up speakers and also the lock button was weird,now they're both fixed and plus my phone looks BRAND NEW!!

Reviews.Title: OEM
Reviews.Author: Raul M. Anonuevo "justme25"
Reviews.Content: The product is indeed an OEM.  My BB looks like new again.  this product is of high quality with all the pieces included.  I also ordred a new LCD to match the new body and my phone now is godd as NEW.

Reviews.Title: dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: Fanisha Harrypersad
Reviews.Content: this doesnt even fit the phone and on top of that it looks old... such a waste of money ....

Reviews.Title: Doesn't fit!
Reviews.Author: Bold user
Reviews.Content: The overall housing fit pretty much fine, but the keypad doesn't. Tried several times to get it to fit but without any real success...eventually I had to settle for the old keypad from my previous housing kit.

Reviews.Title: nice item , as described
Reviews.Author: hirzo0o
Reviews.Content: the item as described but not exactly , doesn't have the T-Mobile logo plus the speaker sound is not clear for everything else is ok

Reviews.Title: Glitchy
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Miller "Maximus"
Reviews.Content: This is the second time i am purchasing this screen. The first time was because I had broken the original screen. But the new screen only lasted 4 months. I decided to buy another screen just to keep the phone going until I can afford another phone. The very same day I changed the screen I noticed it scrambled and I had to lock the screen which makes it go black then unlock the screen and I noticed it was back to normal. Since that first incident it happened a few times after but has started to increase in frequency now that I am 2 weeks in with this phone. I suspect it won't last as long as 4 months. Also, there was a very small gap left at the top when the screen was fitted.When the screen works it looks really nice but then every now and again it scrambles and I have to press the lock button then unlock it and it returns to normal. If you can avoid buying a new screen then avoid it. If you decide you want a new screen just keep in mind it may expire in 4 months or less

Reviews.Title: Dont work!!!
Reviews.Author: Shazzz
Reviews.Content: When did the change in my BB, it began to restart endlessly. It was tested in a friend's BB and spent exactly the same!

Reviews.Title: good stuff
Reviews.Author: C. Miller
Reviews.Content: came in a nice lil envelop for cheap shipping. only thin i didn't find were some tiny conductive sponges on the back plate which is on the chassis i removed isn't on the new 1. so i had 2 transfer then from old 2 new case/chassis

ProductInfo.Features:
Top cover is already connected to the housing (soldered on by blackberry)
We sell only Original OEM Blackberry Products
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Bold 9700 OEM Full Housing with Battery Door
